title: The Theatre of Fantasies
description: Galena is a struggling actress in modern day New Orleans. She can't quite pay her rent and she recently found out her boyfriend was unfaithful with one of her best friends. An opportunity arises to explore new and different possibilities if she's willing to embrace a life of sexual adventure. The Theatre of Fantasies is renowned for its plays of erotica and sexuality. If Galena is willing to overcome her barriers and delve into a new and explicit world of passion, a leading role awaits and a much brighter future.
author: Cailee Francis
